title: Ep 316: Howie Mandel & The Magical Phone Call
itunes:title: Ep 316: Howie Mandel & The Magical Phone Call
description:
Bobby gets double goosebumps. Howie likes Khalyla more than Ashton Kutcher. Khalyla is our resident germofile. We talk opening for Diana Ross, why Howie almost said 'no deal' to Deal or No Deal, the origin of the glove trick, and the Shin Lim incident.
